attributes.action: Freeze mortgage payments and household bills until Covid-19 fully contained !
attributes.additional_details:
The ssp support announced by government is next to nothing, the economic slowdown and safety has resulted in many people can't go to work, lesser income and hugely increased expenses, the medium and low income families now feeling the heat how to get through the situation.

I ask the government to consider a legislation to ask all lenders that the mortgage, rent, credit facilities and household bills to freeze until the Covid-19 situation clears and economy is back in its feet.

Thank you
attributes.background: The corona virus situation is getting more serious in the country and as a result businesses are suffering so the jobs stability and increased cost of living in the current difficult situation.
